parameters: Hello Runemaster, it's time to test your combat skills
through dungeon runs. Go meet with the NPCs.
(Click on them with LMB, or Go near them and press "E")
Come, follow me towards your first dungeon run, Runemaster!
Go towards your first dungeon. Bring your wits and skills!
상자개봉 - 바로 열리면서 스텟, 장비, 마법 중 하나 드랍
한등급 높은 상자개봉(15%) - 반만 천천히 열리고 화면
기본 레어도는 일반 65%, 고급20%, 레어10% 전설 5%
